about_the_game:
Invasion Alert!

Our planet faces a relentless onslaught as two alien races wage war across the galaxy. The peace-seeking race warns of an imminent invasion and provides advanced technology to fortify our cities. Now, as the assault has begun, we boldly advance on the invaders with our most powerful weapons. Behold, the mighty 'Abner Jack' tank series, each armed with massive guns, skillfully manned, and ready to lead the fight through the trenches against the alien incursion!

Hop in the gunner's seat of an Abner Jack in this third-person, rogue-like game set in a dieselpunk world. Fight through five regions of relentless foes to defeat the invaders and defend your planet. Man one of six different tanks, use deployable turrets, landmines, and rocket barrages, and use over fifty different items as you battle against both ground and air adversaries.

name: Iron and Lead Demo
short_description: Take control of an Abner Jack in a rogue-like game. Navigate five regions, man one of six tanks, deploy turrets, landmines, and rocket barrages. Wield over fifty items to defend your planet against relentless ground and air foes.
